DOC.criteria: least 18 year age ; provide write informed consent prior participation give sign copy inform consent form ; complete confidentiality disclosure agreement ; good general health determine Investigator/designee ; agree participate oral/dental product study course study ; agree delay dentistry ( include dental prophylaxis ) study complete ; agree refrain use nonstudy oral hygiene product ; agree return schedule visit follow study procedure ; . least one tooth Schiff sensitivity score least 1 response air challenge Yeaple Probe score 1040 response tactile challenge selfreported pregnancy nursing ; severe periodontal disease , characterize purulent exudate , generalize mobility , and/or severe recession ; active treatment periodontitis ; fix facial orthodontic appliance ; history kidney stone ; know allergy follow ingredient ; aqua , glycerin , cellulose gum , dipotassium oxalate , carbomer , sodium hydroxide , sodium benzoate , potassium sorbate disease condition might interfere safe completion study ; inability undergo study procedure .
